full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
===========

### Project Details

* **Tender Reference**: WS3830006543
* **Project Title**: External Canopy Project - Walkway to Building CC117
* **Publication Date**: February 2, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 1, 2023 at 02:00 PM (EST)
* **Provincial Region**: Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)

### Contracting Entity Information

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
* **Contact**: Melanie Parent, melanie.parent@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Procurement Information

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3830006543
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Project Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals for the acquisition of canvas and temporary winter shelters to protect external walkways from the elements at Building CC117 in Courcelette, Quebec. All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by February 28, 2023, at 02:00 PM (EST). Late bids will be considered non-responsive.

### Notice URL

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15302757?extsite=MTUzMDI3NTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Additional Information

This contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The project will be delivered in Quebec, excluding the National Capital Region.  The successful contractor will be required to provide evidence of meeting the necessary trade agreements and procurement category standards.
